definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc

sentences.english: He busied himself by tidying up his desk.
He took a basketball from under the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他從書桌下拿出一個藍球。

sentences.english: The desk was covered with a litter of documents.
sentences.chinese: 書桌上滿滿地放着一堆雜亂的文件。

sentences.english: Put it in a desk drawer.
sentences.chinese: 把它放到書桌抽屜裏去。

sentences.english: The first thing to catch your sight is the neatly arranged desks in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 首先映入眼簾的是中間排列整齊的書桌。

sentences.english: Put the cards on the desk.
He sat down at his desk to work out the exact figures.
sentences.chinese: 他在書桌旁坐下來，準備算出準確的數字。

sentences.english: With fingers poised over the keyboard, I'm faced with myriad options.
sentences.chinese: 雙手懸空書桌，十指難落鍵盤，一心面對，衆多選擇。

sentences.english: If your dest is broken, you should fix it up .
sentences.chinese: 如果你的書桌壞了，你應該把它修好。

sentences.english: You should find the recipe and some ambergris on my desk.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在我的書桌上找到配方和一些龍涎香。

sentences.english: There are three story-books and a schoolbag in the desk.
sentences.chinese: 書桌裏有三本故事書和一個書包。

sentences.english: He drummed the desk with his fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他用手指答答地敲擊書桌。

sentences.english: The lamp sheds soft light on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 那盞燈把柔和的光灑在書桌上。

sentences.english: The whole class are waiting at their desks for their teacher.
sentences.chinese: 整班同學坐在書桌前等候着老師。

sentences.english: This desk is just as wide as that old one.
sentences.chinese: 我這張書桌正好和那張舊書桌一樣寬。

sentences.english: This desk is just as wide as that old one.
sentences.chinese: 我這張書桌正好和那張舊書桌一樣寬。

definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
to set up/to arrange/to lay out
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
